description: This is a significant upgrade on the TOUGH2 code, which is only distributed via ESTSC. The executable version contains two pieces of third party code. The developer is in the process of obtaining permission to release an executable version with these third party libraries. At this point we will only release source code.
name: TOUGH2-MP Ver 2.0, the parallel version of TOUGH2

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
